The ring contains the essence of a bound djinn or efreeti, compressed into crystalline form. Three times you may reshape reality itselfâ€”but choose wisely, for even gods cannot grant more than three wishes. The ring grows dimmer with each use, and when the third wish is spoken, it dissolves like a dream upon waking.
magicEffect: Cast Wish (3 charges, ring crumbles to dust when expended)
name: Ring of Three Wishes
